m_szDocTitle: SYSTEM FOR DETERMINING AN UNDERWRITING RISK, RISK SCORE, OR PRICE OF INSURANCE USING SENSOR INFORMATION - STEMPORA, Jeffrey
m_szDocSumamry: SYSTEM FOR DETERMINING AN UNDERWRITING RISK, RISK SCORE, OR PRICE OF INSURANCE USING SENSOR INFORMATION WIPO Patent Application WO/2016/028933 A1 Abstract: A system (900) for determining a level of underwriting risk (917), a risk score, or a price of insurance (918) associated with an individual (901) performing a physical or mental activity, the system comprises one or more sensors (920) configured to record first information (907) related to the properties (910) of one or more eyes of the individual (901) selected from the group: pupil size or dilation; eyelid state or motion; microsaccade a
